SQL uses the term NULL to refer to missing values.


```{r list-tables}
library(sqldf)
db <- dbConnect(SQLite(), dbname="titanic.sqlite")
dbListTables(conn=db)
ti <- dbGetQuery(conn=db,
 "SELECT * FROM ti")
dim(ti)
head(ti)
```

```{r shut-down-gracefully}
dbDisconnect(conn=db)
```
